source: miss is as good as a mile
lemma: miss is as good as a mile
definitions: A failure, no matter how close to success, is still a failure.
Being very close to achieving something but not quite succeeding is the same as not achieving it at all.
examples: We almost won the championship, but a miss is as good as a mile.
He was just a few points shy of the perfect score, but a miss is as good as a mile.
They nearly caught the thief, but a miss is as good as a mile, and he got away.
synonyms: a near miss is still a miss
